title: 74th Independence Day Ceremony falling on 04th February, 2022
decision_details:
- The Cabinet decided to appoint the following Cabinet Sub-Committee to provide necessary guidance to organizing activities of the 74th Independence Day Ceremony falling on 04th February, 2022

    • His	Excellency Gotabaya Rajapaksa,
      The President ‑ (Chairman)
      Minister of Defence 
      
    • Hon.	Mahinda Rajapaksa,
      Prime Minister

    • Hon. (Prof.) G.L. Peiris,
      Foreign Minister;

    • Hon. Dinesh Gunawardena,
      Minister of Education; 

    • Hon. Gamini Lokuge,
      Minister of Power; 

    • Hon. Janaka Bandara Tennakoon,
      Minister of Public Services, Provincial Councils & 	Local Government;

    • Hon. Keheliya Rambukwella,
      Minister of Health; 

    • Hon. Chamal Rajapaksa,
      Minister of Irrigation,
      State Minister of Home Affairs,

    • Hon. Dullas Alahapperuma, 
      Minister of Mass Media; 

    • Hon. Basil Rajapaksa,
      Minister of Finance;

    • Hon. Vasudeva Nanayakkara,
      Minister of Water Supply
